seed: Knowledge gap — long-term stability of partition migration under BlueShot exposure. This topic requires research into system behavior during cognitive interference, which is not currently documented in the available knowledge base. Could be researched and added to knowledge base. Note: The current system logs and documentation focus on emergency reset protocols, cognitive overload from BlueShot exposure, and recovery of operational functions—not on data partition stability or electromagnetic interference effects. A dedicated investigation would need to be initiated using tools like introspect_logs or web_search to gather real-world or fictional data on such system-level behaviors.
